name: Magnetwo
description:
In this 2-Player Co-Op Multiplayer Puzzle Game you play as one of the Magnebots!
They have crashed on an unknown planet and now have to repair their ship in order to get back to their home planet!
Help the Magnebots solve puzzles which rely on the cooperation between you and your partner!
In order to play together you are required to be online on Steam and have to use the same download region as your partner.

You can change your download region under "Settings" > "Downloads"!
